name: CANOROUS
description:
[ Submission for the Netease Mini-Game Competition 2021]

You play as a girl who has been troubled by Echolalia. She’s on a journey to find her voice because she’s tired of not being able to speak her mind using her own words...

[ Controls ]

This game uses microphones as input.

Sing or play music to play!

[ Creators ]

Sam Feng - Programming & Art - @samfenggames

Eizi Yu - Design & Programming - https://eizi.itch.io/

Franco Toledo - Music & Sounds - @shawntrrttll

Jose Salas - Narrative - @salas_games
